text: I think from the red tour fans can
expect the unexpected I think I really
like the element of surprise and I love
incorporating that into the shows I like
for these tours to be completely
different from every single one we've
done I think that the visuals kind of
portrayed on this tour will be I guess
more grown-up and and a little bit more
mature than things we've done in the
past and I think on my previous albums
and my previous tours I've really liked
to operate in the element of fantasy and
I think that this tour incorporates a
little bit more reality into the visuals
